content.rendered:
Continuing with Prestige Motorcars’ quest to create awareness about electric vehicles in Indonesia, we set up an exhibition at World Trade Centre 1 for all the office workers and passerby to experience Tesla. Be sure to keep an eye out for our Instagram to see where we will be having our next Exhibition!
